sportPhysio.title: Sports Physiotherapy
sportPhysio.description: Specialized treatment for athletes. Prevention, injury recovery and sports performance improvement.

ecoMsk.title: MSK Ultrasound
ecoMsk.description: Real-time imaging diagnosis to accurately evaluate musculoskeletal injuries and guide treatments.

epi.title: EPI
epi.description: Percutaneous Intratissue Electrolysis. Authorized EPI center for treatment of tendinopathies and chronic injuries.

dryNeedling.title: Dry Needling
dryNeedling.description: Invasive technique for the treatment of myofascial trigger points and chronic muscle pain.

manualTherapy.title: Manual Therapy
manualTherapy.description: Specialized manual techniques to relieve pain, improve mobility and restore joint function.

therapeuticExercise.title: Therapeutic Exercise
therapeuticExercise.description: Personalized exercise programs for rehabilitation, injury prevention and physical condition improvement.
